project.project_summary: [1.21.11 / April Fools] - Modpack that mainly tries to support snapshots with maximum performance, including Sodium. This includes minimal QoL mods.

version.changelog:
- Added [More Culling](https://modrinth.com/mod/moreculling)
- Updated [Concurrent Chunk Management Engine](https://modrinth.com/mod/c2me-fabric), [BadOptimizations](https://modrinth.com/mod/badoptimizations), [Fabric API](https://modrinth.com/mod/fabric-api), [Cloth Config API](https://modrinth.com/mod/cloth-config), [Lithium](https://modrinth.com/mod/lithium),and [Very Many Players](https://modrinth.com/mod/vmp-fabric)
